attributes.action: Keep Queen Elizabeth 2nd to stay in Brtain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I Joined the QE2 in 1976 as a comis waiter,turned up at cunard house to take the coach to heathrow airport to fly to JKF new york, what a wonderful sight & to see my ship in new york amongst all the beautiful buildings & to be proud she was built in Britain & carried her home port name across the world.Another engineering feat that sadley we are losing,come on Gorden bring her back home to Southampton & all the people who cannot afford cruises,but can dream.
Steven Copeland ex Merchant Seaman.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
